title: Searge: 明天将会有快照
author: obby825
txt_content:
（依然是倒过来看）

Searge: Some of the upcoming snapshots will probably be extremely unstable, especially the one tomorrow. Don't try them without having world backups
Searge: I optimized the memory usage when connected to a server. We kept an unnecessary server object around on the client. Not anymore #RiskyChange
Searge: Snapshots give you nightmares? Can't handle them anymore? It's as easy to disable them again as it was to enable them in the first place.

Searge: 接下来的快照可能非常不稳定，特别是明天的快照。别忘了备份世界。
Searge: 我优化了连接到服务器时的内存占用。我们以前在客户端保存了不必要的服务器对象。没有更多的了#有风险的改动
Searge: 快照是你的噩梦？不能处理它们？你可以很方便地在快照开启时关闭快照。

注：
“明天”是指天朝的9月2日
